name: Antipaint (itch)
description:
Antipaint is a quirky shoot 'em up where each level you beat results in a unique painting.

The game is under development.

This is an early alpha demo build of the game. I appreciate any and all feedback, help me make Antipaint the best!

Antipaint will be released as a full game in the future. Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1418390/Antipaint/

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse1 for main attack

Mouse2 for supermove

Spacebar to zoom in/out
